__e: I didn't even mean to burden you with it.
I got into a car accident. I was a vegetable for a month, and afterwards I was unable to use my legs. To face you in this manner-
I know you must sometimes see this power as a curse, but you were sent here to stop evil from taking over the Earth, and now, that time has apparently come.
I know you must sometimes see this power as a curse, but you were sent here to stop evil from taking over the Earth, and now, that time has apparently come.
And if you can't, then I wouldn't want to be a burden on you.
He seemed to have killed himself to set me free.
It is my burden to live with... ..and mine to die with.
No hope of ever laying down the burden and letting someone else do the job.
This is my sin... and I must bear it all my days.
Your husband has added a new burden to your heavy lot.
If I can carry your load on my back I certainly would, because that's how much I trust you.

Is that the last thing that anyone needs, or is that the last thing that you need, because you refuse to come visit your only daughter in prison and you'd rather not have that weighing on your conscience for any longer than it has to?
And I simply didn't want to burden you with knowing what was inside of them.
His death need not be upon our house.
You know, it can be a burden to always know what's gonna happen in the future.
You might think it's the problem, but once it's gone, you might miss it.
Sorry to be a burden, man, but I don't know how much longer I can take this.
He's suffered a breakdown but I don't think he killed his family and I know he still loved his wife.
I know he hurt you, Jeremy, but believe me, a demon isn't a burden you want to carry.
And you don't have to tell me, okay, but whatever burden you're carrying, please...
Because I knew the burden my name would be with your family.
